page.title: 09Games We Play in Kimpton
page.content: The games that we play form three groups :indoor games,including board and computer games;organised sports, which we learn at school and in the village, and play_ ground games. Here are the rules for some of the games which we have invented: The aim of RED ROVERS is to capture members of an opposing team after selecting one by name in a chant:"Red Rovers,Red Rovers,send (name) over." VAMPIRE BAT:is our variation of catch and release, using the lines painted on the play_ground.As we chase we have to stay on the lines. In WALL BALL : a line of players takes it in turn to kick a ball once at a wall.If he misses the wall or touches the ball twice he is out.The remaining player wins. We believe that these games may be played elsewhere under different names
